Articles.Content: nice idea. +1 from me if i can continue the game after "completion". anyway, this could also be used as steam achievements(although i don't care about them, just popped into my head and i am sure others care about them)
I could see this being an interesting idea along side achievements. Doesnt end the game but gives an interesting goal to play towards.

KSP is an open-ended game. You make your own victory conditions ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you have trouble finding them - I suggest making your first end-game goal to research all the technologies.
